name: poison-fang
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A sharp-fanged attack.
May badly poison the foe.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A sharp-fanged attack.
May badly poison the foe.

with toxic fangs.
It may also badly
poison the foe.
